summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons inmate roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York) generated on July 23, 2019. It lists hundreds of inmates with their registration numbers, housing locations, and admission dates. Jeffrey Epstein is listed among the inmates with an admission date of July 8, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate at MCC New York with admission date July 8, 2019 and a status of 'A-PRE' (likely present).

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Admission to MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as being admitted to the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York) dated July 23, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate with an admission date of July 8, 2019.
The roster contains hundreds of other inmates, indicating this is a standard facility population report.
The document provides a snapshot of the inmate population at the facility where Epstein was held prior to his death.
Epstein's status is listed as 'A-PRE', which likely indicates he was present at the facility at the time the report was generated.
